🏢ABOUT WEATHERHAVEN

GLOBAL LEADER IN
DEPLOYABLE SHELTERS

For over four decades, Weatherhaven has been pioneering deployable shelter technology, providing rapid-deployment solutions that perform reliably in the world's most challenging environments.

40+
Years Experience
50+
Countries Served
1000+
Deployments
24/7
Global Support

OUR HISTORY

Four decades of innovation, growth, and commitment to excellence in deployable shelter technology.

1983

Company Founded

Weatherhaven established in Vancouver, Canada, pioneering deployable shelter technology.

1990

First Military Contract

Secured major military contract for tactical command centers, establishing defense market presence.

1995

International Expansion

Opened European operations and began serving clients in over 20 countries worldwide.

2000

Disaster Response Division

Launched specialized division for emergency response and humanitarian aid shelters.

2008

Arctic Research Success

Deployed custom research facilities in extreme Arctic conditions, expanding into scientific applications.

2015

Global Manufacturing

Established manufacturing facilities in North America, Europe, and Asia for global reach.

2020

Digital Innovation

Launched digital configurator platform and advanced IoT integration for smart shelters.

2024

Future Forward

Leading the industry with sustainable materials and next-generation deployable solutions.
